org.apereo.cas.configuration.config

Class CasCoreBootstrapStandaloneConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apereo.cas.configuration.config.CasCoreBootstrapStandaloneConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.cloud.bootstrap.config.PropertySourceLocator

    @Profile(value="standalone")
 @ConditionalOnProperty(value="spring.cloud.config.enabled",
                       havingValue="false")
 @Configuration(value="casStandaloneBootstrapConfiguration")
public class CasCoreBootstrapStandaloneConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.cloud.bootstrap.config.PropertySourceLocator
